name: Leo
description: Leonidas, known as Leo, rules over all that involves light and leadership, granting vigor and strength while driving away darkness.

skills.name: Gash Claw
skills.description: Performs 3 slashes to a single target. The first 2 hits deal 80% ATK as DMG each, and the last one deals 150% ATK as DMG. While in the [Lionheart] states, deals AoE DMG in a cone.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG of the first 2 hits to 100% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.81)
upgrades.level3: Increases the last hit's DMG to 180% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.141)

skills.name: Lionheart Awakening
skills.description: Enters the [Lionheart] state. Increases ATK/ATK SPD by 50%/100% and gains Super Armor for 10s. Normal Attacks deal AoE DMG in a cone.

upgrades.level3: The [Lionheart] state lasts for 15s. (Unlocks at Lv.101)

skills.name: Weakness Strike
skills.description: Interrupts the target, dealing 250% ATK as DMG and reducing their Armor by 25% for 5s.

upgrades.level2: Increases DMG dealt to 270% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.21)
upgrades.level4: Increases DMG dealt to 300% ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.161)
